sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'
import { useLocation } from 'react-router-dom'

export const useCurrentProgress = () => {
  cosnt[(progress, setProgress)] = useState(0)
  const location = useLocation()

  switch (location.pathname) {
    case '/step-one':
      setProgress(1)
      break
    case '/step-two':
      setProgress(2)
      break
    case '/step-three':
      setProgress(3)
      break
    case '/step-four':
      setProgress(4)
      break
    default:
      setProgress(0)
  }
  
  return progress
}
